profile:
Clearbrook Glass is Abbotsford's Glass Installation & Repair Centre!

At Clearbrook Glass we pride ourselves in our workmanship, the quality of our products, and our care for customers. Locally owned and operated, you can feel confident in choosing Clearbrook Glass.
Clearbrook Glass has been working with automotive, commercial, and residential glass in the Fraser Valley for over 20 years. Our success has come through providing good service and quality work.
In November 2014 Clearbrook Glass was purchased by Bruce Friesen and his son Brent Friesen. Bruce is a successful business owner in the Fraser Valley. After building a property management company, Bruce was looking for new business opportunities. Brent started his career at a large accounting firm. After becoming a Chartered Accountant he moved to industry and worked as a controller and financial analyst in various businesses.
When Bruce and Brent found Clearbrook Glass they realized it was a great business. Clearbrook Glassâ€™s values of high quality work and great service were in alignment with their values. Clearbrook Glass was also a great opportunity to contribute to their local Abbotsford business community.
Clearbrook Glass is a full service glass shop. Our services include cars, trucks, renovation windows, glass replacement, custom showers, mirrors, doors, commercial storefronts, interior partitions, table-tops, and much more!

Office Location
1-2139 Clearbrook Road
Abbotsford, BC V2T 4H6

Office Hours

Monday: 8 am - 5 pm
Tuesday: 8 am - 5 pm
Wednesday: 8 am - 5 pm
Thursday: 8 am - 5 pm
Friday8 am - 5 pm
Saturday: 8:30 am - 3 pm
Sunday: Closed

24-Hour Emergency Service
